mapper.select: insert into organz (ORGNZ_NO, ORGNZ_NM, ENG_ORGNZ_NM, ORGNZ_DSTNCT, HMPAGE_URL, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, ADDR, DETAIL_ADDR, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO, MAP_PROF_NM, LAB_INTRO, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT, HMNBRD_DSTNCT ) values (null, #{orgnzNm}, #{engOrgnzNm}, #{orgnzDstnct},#{hmpageUrl},#{telNo },#{faxNo},#{addr},#{detailAddr},#{prntsOrgnzNo},#{mapProfNm},#{labIntro},#{rsrchrInfoText},#{hmnbrdDstnct})
